moves.1. e4: One of my "glorious" losses. This is about the subject "Don't forget to castle!".
moves.1... d6 2. d4 Nf6 3. Nc3 g6 4. f4: The Austrian Attack in the Pirc Defense.
moves.8... Nh5 9. Be3 cxd4: It would be better for black to think about castling!
moves.10. Qxd4 dxe5 11. fxe5 Qa5: Now the knight hangs on for dear life on the black king. This cannot be good.
moves.12. O-O-O:
!
The open d-file is of advantage for white, but still black does not think about castling until...
moves.12... Nxe5 13. Nxe5 Qxe5:
? 
"Better an end with suffer than suffering without ending." or so I would translate a German proverb. This leads to immediate checkmate.
13. ... Bxe5 14. Qd7  Kf8 15. Nd5 Qd8 struggles on.
